headline.main: TV Getting a New Cast of Advertisers; New Cast of TV Advertisers Takes Cigarettes' Time

docs.abstract: Indus, in wake of official and to cigarette ad on TV, apparently is recouping much of $150-million estimated loss; much business comes from oil cos, ins cos, retailers and travel-oriented businesses; details

keywords.value: TOBACCO, TOBACCO PRODUCTS AND SMOKERS ARTICLES
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: The television industry is apparently recouping much of the $150-million that it estimates cigarette advertisers spent on it in 1970 and that was lost when the law barring cigarette commercials from the airwaves went into effect last Friday at midnight.
